java.lang.String.value: Sample List sequence. This just returns the static list.xml data contained in the 'data' Folder Change this to anthing you want to return live data form target applications.
Sample Login sequence. Change this sequence to anything enabling a Login with a user and password to the target system. The best way is to call a Login transaction.
